name: FreshCharge Ruru
storyline:
At first glance, "RYO=RURUBE" is an ordinary girl who can be found anywhere. However, she had a big secret that she could not tell anyone.
What a surprise, she was "Fresh Charge RURU", a Fighting Princess
of Light who fights against huge evil without being known to others.
The battle against "BELF," an evil army that plans to take over the world by stealing people's motivation, has just begun. Hang in there, RURU, don't lose.
Do your special flying kick, the "Burning Spirit"!

Come on, today is another day... Fresh Charge!
summary: Defeat all the enemies on the stage with a deadly flying kick. Flying kicks gain momentum by charging. If you can achieve it before this falls down, the stage is cleared. Please try to clear all.
